content: grandma birdie s baby blankie this baby blanket has a fun geometric design and is totally reversible finished size about 34 wide and 38 long after lightly blocking but you can make it any size depending on the amount of yarn you have yarn premier yarns deborah norville everyday 4 5 balls 113 gr each or 203 yds color#ed100- 01 snow white i used just over 4 skeins needles 6mm needles or us # 9 gauge 24 row and 20 stitches = 4 x 4 for blanket not critical seed stitch even number of sts row 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end row2 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end repeat row 1 and 2 for pattern pattern stitch a multiple of 12 sts row 1 and 2 - * k6 p6 repeat from * row 3 and 4 - * p1 k5 p5 k1 repeat from * row 5 and 6 - * k1 p1 k4 p4 k1 p1 repeat from * row 7 and 8 - * p1 k1 p1 k3 p3 k1 p1 k1 repeat from * row 9 and 10 - * k1 p1 twice k2 p2 k1 p1 twice repeat from * row 11 and 12 - * p1 k1 repeat from * row 13 and 14 - * k1 p1 repeat from * row 15 and 16 - * p1 k1 twice p2 k2 p1 k1 twice repeat from * row 17 and 18 - * k1 p1 k1 p3 k3 p1 k1 p1 repeat from * row 19 and 20 - * p1 k1 p4 k4 p1 k1 repeat from * row 21 and 22 - * k1 p5 k5 p1 repeat from * row 23 and 24 - * p6 k6 repeat from * row 25 and 26 - * p5 k1 p1 k5 repeat from * row 27 and 28 - * p4 k1 p1 twice k4 repeat from * row 29 and 30 - * p3 k1 p1 3 times k3 repeat from * row 31 and 32 - * p2 k1 p1 4 times k2 repeat from * row 33 and 34 - * p1 k1 repeat from * row 35 and 36 - * k1 p1 repeat from * row 37 and 38 - * k2 p1 k1 4 times p2 repeat from * row 39 and 40 - * k3 p1 k1 3 times p3 repeat from * row 41 and 42 - * k4 p1 k1 twice p4 repeat from * row 43 and 44 - * k5 p1 k1 p5 repeat from * repeat row 1-44 blanket cast on 154 sts work 5 row seed stitch maintain the seed stitch borders place markers after the first 5 sts and before last 5 sts of each row the main pattern is worked on the 144 sts in between the markers work the main pattern-repeat a total of 5 times or until you reach the desired length work 5 row seed stitch and bind off
